attributes.action: Require all takeaway food in fully recyclable containers/packaging
attributes.additional_details: There have been attempts to encourage food providers to reduce their plastic use but to no avail. Only legisis likely to force change on a wholesale scale
attributes.background: Many takeaway food containers are single use plastic tubs/pots. By making it a legal requirement to use only fully recyclable or biodegradable containers in all takeaway foods we could reduce plastic disposal.
